descriptions.emissionsToAir: üõà Start browsing emission information of Finnish PRTR facilities by first selecting pollutant. By using the adjacent selectors, it is possible to filter the information by year or location. For finding emissions of a specific facility, please refer to facility search.

descriptions.wasteTransfers: üõà Browse through the data of waste transfers of PRTR facilities by using the selectors above. It is possible to filter the information by year or location. For finding waste transfers of a specific facility, please refer to facility search. Hazardous waste is defined by Article 2(14) of the E-PRTR.
